page.title: 01The Wentworth Area
page.content: The area around Wentworth is mainly {farmland.}There are quite a few different farms but most of the land is still owned by{Wentworth Estates. Most of the new building in the area is at{Thorpe Hesley}and this is mostly private housing estates. There is very little new building in{Wentworth village because the whole village is owned by the estate.{Harley}is the smallest of the villages in the area and there is a mixture of old and new building.The farming land is a mixture of cattle and crops and it is a very pretty area. The main historic building in the area is{Wentworth {Woodhouse.}Now the area is starting to attract tourists so craft and gift shops are starting to open.
